title: Watch: LAW – sooncome
body:
So if you haven’t already guessed, we’re pretty massive fans of this gurl called **LAW**.

So much so, that we booked her for her first headline London show on the 30th of May.

**[The EVENT is HERE.](https://www.facebook.com/events/503640323024237/)** You should come.

We booked her after the release of one track, so as you might imagine, it was actually a pretty nerve wracking experience watching this new puece for the first time. Thankfully, this girl is FIRE. Like, next level FIRE. FUCK. This is one intriguing bit of footage.

Blog it like I see it bro.
